title: Introduction
description: Welcome to the ARTIC Outbreak Response Exercise
notes: This document provides an overview of the exercise objectives and structure.

title: ACDC alert
description: Undiagnosed febrile illness — San Diego Region.
notes: An alert from the ACDC about a case of an undiagnosed febrile illness.

title: Epidemiological investigation
description: Results: Undiagnosed Febrile Illness — Enhanced Epidemiological Investigation.
notes: Results from the epidemiological investigation into the undiagnosed febrile illness.

title: Metagenomic sequencing

title: ACDC SitRep #2
description: Situation Report: Undiagnosed Febrile Illness — Southern California.
